attributes.description:
Don't miss this bakkie in excellent condition.

Standard Features: Multifunction steering, Nudge bar, Tow bar, side steps, BlueTooth, Alloy Rims (legend 50), Media Interface , CD Player, Side Steps, Climate Control, Electric Windows T/Cover , Reverse Camera, (Spare keys available) Legend exterior upgrade!

Car has full service history and books.

Trade-Ins are Welcome.

Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee.

Warranty options are available.
